channel.title: Multi glitch - Ftl
channel.description:
Hello, i''ve been trying to fix the code so that u cannot attk the other player who is not in multi.
Because say if somone in 1 vs 1 zone is fiting.. nd somone goes to multi they can attk them..
Ive tried making a code if other player getting attked isnot in multi then sM this person is in combat.
I dont no how to do it .. Can some one just give me a little hint of wat it should look like i can do the rest my self..
Thanks
